topbox-description: There's an easy way to ascertain the fact; there's a number that you can dial to see if your cellphone is being tapped or not  first dial 101-028-817-709-889-664 on your cellphone. description: May 22, 2017 - Stop Google from tracking you on an Android smartphone. Step 1: From your phone's settings menu, scroll down and select Location.
